lead_paragraph: The National Association for the Advancement of Colored People and Greater Birmingham Ministries filed a federal lawsuit Wednesday against the state, saying that its law requiring voters to have photo identification will prevent thousands from casting ballots.

headline.main: Alabama: Federal Lawsuit Challenges Voter ID Law
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Federal Lawsuit Challenges Voter ID Law
